summary: On his one thousandth birthday, an evil leprechaun selects the descendant of one of his slaves to have as his bride, leaving it up to the girl's boyfriend to save her.
cast: Warwick Davis|Charlie Heath|Shevonne Durkin|Sandy Baron|Adam Biesk|James Lancaster|Linda Hopkins|Arturo Gil|Kimmy Robertson|Clint Howard|Andrew Craig|David Powledge|Billy Beck|Al White|Martha Hackett|Jonathan R. Perkins|Tony Cox|Mark Kiely|Michael McDonald|Warren A. Stevens|Matthew Anderson|Dawn Comer|Barry Schwartz|Gabriella Sinclair|Danny Roque|Samantha Davis|Brian D. Kline|Shelley Waggener
title: Leprechaun 2
